oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Qiṣṣat Maryam al-ṣāmitah : manuscript, [1629]
قصة مريم الصامتة
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Biqāʻī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Ḥamīd al-Dīn. (copyist.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophon (f. 10v), copy completed on 19 Jumadá al-Awwal 1038 AH [January 13, 1629 AD] in the hand of Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Ḥamīd al-Dīn al-Biqāʻī.

Bound with: Hādhā kitāb Sharḥ al-basmalah / li-Shaykh al-Islām Abī Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī (ff. 1r-4v) -- Muqaddimah musammāh bi-Yāqūtat al-ʻilm / lil-Shaykh Abī Isḥāq al-Tūnisī (ff. 5r-9v).
MS Arab 109. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mary--Blessed Virgin, Saint
